caption: After Pierre Filloeul (1696–1754; born Abbeville, France; died Paris, France), after Jean-Baptiste Pater (1695–1736; born Valenciennes, France; died Paris, France; active Paris and Valenciennes), Les Aveaux Indiscrets (The Indiscreet Confessions), 18th century. Etching and engraving on paper; 34 × 38.2 cm (plate), 43.1 cm (sheet). Gift of Christopher C. Forbes, Class of 1972 (2024-339)
captionhtml: After Pierre Filloeul (1696–1754; born Abbeville, France; died Paris, France), after Jean-Baptiste Pater (1695–1736; born Valenciennes, France; died Paris, France; active Paris and Valenciennes), Les Aveaux Indiscrets (The Indiscreet Confessions), 18th century. Etching and engraving on paper; 34 × 38.2 cm (plate), 43.1 cm (sheet). Gift of Christopher C. Forbes, Class of 1972 (2024-339)
